description:
We are the UK's oldest independent digital media agency.
No one has a longer track record in delivering high-performance digital marketing.
We are digital performance specialists, we use digital marketing to drive measurable results for our clients. That can mean anything from conventional e-commerce to lead generation. 
 
What’s different about Harvest? 
    We work smarter
That’s not our opinion - it’s Google’s. Benchmarking us against similar agencies, Google found our accounts had a much more complex structure with on average double the number of active keywords.
Integrated approach
From the start, we have offered an integrated service across media and creative. So - for instance - we make it easy to switch budgets across channels so that our client's spend is always optimised.
Maths + magic
Of course data is important - but so is offering a fantastic user experience. We focus on both the maths and the magic of digital marketing.
We get results
We’re a performance agency. We are focused on helping our clients to hit their targets - and we’re really good at that.
